      controller - is the game's controller
      move - is the move message received from the view

    • handlerMove

      public boolean handlerMove​(Model model, GodCardController controller, PlayerMove move)
      This method changes the game's flow by asking the player to use the god's power after a move In particular, this god can move every time he wants around the perimeter of the board. It checks if the selected worker is in the perimeter and if it's true it then asks the player if he/she wants to use the power again, until he gets stuck, he moved away from the perimeter or he answered no If the power has been used the worker flag is reset
      Overrides:
      handlerMove in class GodCard
      Parameters:
      model - is the game's model
      controller - is the game's controller
      move - is the move's message received from the view
      Returns:
      true if an error is reported or the flow has been modified, false otherwise

    • performGodMessageForPhaseWithNegativeAnswer

      public void performGodMessageForPhaseWithNegativeAnswer​(Phase phase, Controller controller)
      When a no answer is given for the power, the flow is restored to built (as default)
      Overrides:
      performGodMessageForPhaseWithNegativeAnswer in class GodCard
      Parameters:
      phase - is the god card phase given by the controller
      controller - is the game's controller
